P-Grid v2.0a2 API Specification

SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

pgrid.interfaces.basic
Class PGridP2P

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.interfaces.basic.PGridP2P
All Implemented Interfaces:
P2P
public class PGridP2P
extends Object
implements P2P

This class represents the PGridP2P facility. It is responsible for all activities in the Gridella network (search, exchange). This class implements the Singleton pattern as defined by Gamma et.al. As there could only exist one instance of this class, other clients must use the sharedInstance function to use this class.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Roman Schmidt

Constructor Detail

PGridP2P

protected PGridP2P()
The constructor must be protected to ensure that only subclasses can call it and that only one instance can ever get created. A client that tries to instantiate PGridP2P directly will get an error at compile-time.

Method Detail

sharedInstance

public static PGridP2P sharedInstance()
This creates the only instance of this class. This differs from the C++ standard implementation by Gamma et.al. since Java ensures the order of static initialization at runtime.

Returns:
the shared instance of this class.
See Also:
Lazy instantiation - Balancing performance and resource usage

route

public void route(Key key,
                  Message message)
Description copied from interface: P2P
Send a message to a peer. Peer-to-peer layer is responsible for routing the message across as many peers as necessary. Message delivry is subject to the existance of a path between the origin and the destination. Confirmation receipt is not provided.

Specified by:
route in interface P2P
Parameters:
key - a key that the distant peer is reponsible for
message - the message to send
See Also:
P2P.route(p2p.basic.Key, p2p.basic.Message)

route

public void route(Key[] keys,
                  Message[] message)
Description copied from interface: P2P
Send a message to peers based on several keys. In some cases only one peer will be the destination if all keys are under its responsiblity.

Specified by:
route in interface P2P
Parameters:
keys - an array of destination keys
message - the message to send
See Also:
P2P.route(p2p.basic.Key[], p2p.basic.Message[])

routeToReplicas

public void routeToReplicas(Message message)
Description copied from interface: P2P
Send a message to peers responsible for the same part of the keyspace as the local node. This operation might not be supported by all implementations.

Specified by:
routeToReplicas in interface P2P

public void replicationBalance()
Resumes the replication balancer. This method is invoked after each exchange.

Resets P-Grid by removing all hosts from the local routing table and all items from the local data table.
